content.rendered:
Directed by Jeffrey Reiner. Patricia Cardoso. Joy Lane. Charissa Sanjarernsuithikul. Shana Stein. Daniel Willis.

Written by Julie Durk. Julie Durk. Alicia Carroll. Alicia Carroll. Emmylou Diaz. ChloÃ© Hung. Elyse Morales. Lenn K. Rosenfeld. Jordan Roter.

Cast Warren Christie (Matthew). Amy Acker (Tory). Jon-Michael Ecker (Scott). Aliyah Royale (Ginny). Lex Lumpkin (Elliott). Henry Samiri (Jasper). Kelly Bishop (Mrs. Ivey 1). Baraka Rahmani (Alex Toubassy). Grace Kaufman (Bennet Ayres). Christopher Redman (Dick Ayres). Andres Velez (Roman). Clare Filipow (Kim Stewart). Lachlan Quarmby (James Gianfranco). Megan Best (Darcy Ayres). Emily Tennant (Allie Ward). Aaron Douglas (Otis Winthrop III). Jacqueline Obradors (Ronnie). Elyse Maloway (Jocelyn Morrow). Dhirendra (Cecil Maphala). Bronwen Smith (Candace Brandt). Scott Swanson (Otis Winthrop II). Kimmy Shields (Kimberly).

Language English.

Producers Emmylou Diaz. Lenn K. Rosenfeld. Danielle Weinstock. Rebecca Kirsch. Gigi Boyd. Joe De Oliveira. Emily Fox. ChloÃ© Hung. Jeffrey Reiner. Jordan Roter. Ryan Seacrest. Andrea Shay. Nina Wass. Julie Durk.

Production Ryan Seacrest Productions. ABC Signature.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 11

Status OnGoing (2023–)
